holidays.title: National Pancake Day
holidays.description: Nothing like a fluffy batch of Pancakes drizzled with lots of butter and syrup.

holidays.title: 228 Memorial Day
holidays.description: Revisit history without repeating it. 228 Memorial Day — here’s why we should pay attention.

holidays.title: Andalusia Day
holidays.description: Andalusia Day is celebrated to commemorate the referendum on the Statute of Autonomy of Andalusia.

holidays.title: Car Keys and Small Change Day
holidays.description: Take the passenger seat as we navigate through the fascinating history behind this one-of-a-kind holiday.

holidays.title: Fasching
holidays.description: Fasching has various names and is celebrated in several German states each year.

holidays.title: Feast of Saint Vartan
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the Feast of Saint Vartan this February.

holidays.title: Floral Design Day
holidays.description: Do you love flowers and designs? Then you’re lucky we are celebrating floral designs today!

holidays.title: Global Scouse Day
holidays.description: Ready for bowls of goodness and recipes with secret something? Get cooking like a Scouser today.

holidays.title: Inconvenience Yourself Day
holidays.description: Get ready to make life a little easier for other people with our tips!

holidays.title: International Repetitive Strain Injury Awareness Day
holidays.description: Today teaches us about injuries of these kinds and steps you can take to prevent them.

holidays.title: Launceston Cup
holidays.description: Get ready because this is another moment to witness the fantastic horse-racing event in Launceston.

holidays.title: Linus Pauling Day
holidays.description: The world wouldn’t be quite the same without Linus Pauling. Rediscover his brilliance today.

holidays.title: National Customized Wheel and Tire Day
holidays.description: Get in, petrol heads! We’re celebrating National Customized Wheels and Tires Day.

holidays.title: National Essay Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore the power of essay writing this National Essay Day!

holidays.title: National Public Sleeping Day
holidays.description: Grab a pillow and be prepared for that magical moment when you doze off in public.

holidays.title: National Science Day
holidays.description: We have thought of some incredible ways to celebrate — check them out.

holidays.title: National Time Refund Day
holidays.description: This day takes place every four years and helps people celebrate the leap year.

holidays.title: National Vegan Lipstick Day
holidays.description: Put on some lipstick, and celebrate cruelty-free cosmetics with us this National Vegan Lipstick Day!

holidays.title: Pink Shirt Day Canada
holidays.description: It's time to stand up and stand against bullying today and every other day.

holidays.title: Rare Disease Day
holidays.description: Look out for famous landmarks lighting up for Rare Disease Day, click here to learn more.

holidays.title: US Snow Shoe Day
holidays.description: Out with the sneakers and in with the snowshoes. We’re celebrating U.S. Snowshoe Day!

holidays.title: Jason Aldean’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is infinite greatness in store for this country music singer and songwriter.

holidays.title: LunarEclipse’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber and digital graphics illustrator’s talents know no bounds. Today, we celebrate her!
